channel.title: jMock News
channel.description: jMock is a lightweight mock object testing library for Java.

item.title: See jMock in Action at the ADC
item.description: jMock will be used in the Top-Down TDD using Mock Objects and Inversion of Control tutorial run by Manish Shah and Damian Guy at the Agile Development Conference.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: jMock 1.0.1 Released
item.description: Released jMock 1.0.1, that fixes and improves the generation of error messages.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: EasyMock Comparison
item.description: Added an article comparing jMock and EasyMock.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Print Media Support
item.description: Added style sheets for print media. Articles on this site are now easier to read when printed on paper.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: jMock 1.0.0 Released
item.description: Version 1.0.0 has been released. Download it now.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Custom Stubs
item.description: A new tutorial has been uploaded, showing how to write custom stubs.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Binary Snapshots
item.description: New! Binary snapshots are now available. Get them while they're hot if you want to look cool!
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Continuous Integration is Running Again
item.description: After some downtime while we moved the project hosting onto a new server, the continuous integration process is now building snapshots and updating the website again.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Yoga for your Unit Tests
item.description: A new article, Yoga for your Unit Tests, describes how to use jMock to avoid brittle tests.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: DynaMock Comparison
item.description: A new article, Comparing jMock and Dynamock, explains the difference between jMock and the DynaMock API of mockobjects.com.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Mocking Concrete Classes
item.description: CGLIB support has recently been committed to CVS. This optional extension will allow you to mock concrete classes, helpful if you have to work with awkward and/or legacy code.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce

item.title: Source Snapshots
item.description: Source snapshots are now available for download. Snapshots are created by the continuous integration system whenever anything is committed to the CVS repository.
item.dc:creator: Nat Pryce
